mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` name, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource ur ON rrr.resource_id = ur.id WHERE ar.admin_id=#{adminId} and ur.id is NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
